SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_COUNTRY_QUOTAVARIANCE
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Determine how many kids can be registered for a country based on the currently registered kids and the current quota
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_COUNTRY_QUOTAVARIANCE ( @countryID uniqueidentifier -- Country Extension ID (same as the Constituent ID) of the country to check the quota "room" for ) returns int with execute as caller as begin declare @QuotaVariance int
set @QuotaVariance = dbo.USR_UFN_COUNTRY_CURRENTQUOTA (@countryID) - dbo.USR_UFN_COUNTRY_REGISTEREDCHILDCOUNT (@countryID)
return @QuotaVariance end
